## Validation & Alignment Checklist

Confirm all that apply:

### Playbook Alignment
- [ ] This change aligns with the core principles of the playbook
- [ ] Artifacts are promoted, not reinterpreted
- [ ] No downstream scope expansion is introduced

### Validator Safety
- [ ] Validators remain non-prescriptive
- [ ] No redesign or solutioning logic added
- [ ] Ambiguity is treated as a failure condition

### Anonymization (MANDATORY)
- [ ] No employer, organization, or internal system names
- [ ] No internal URLs, domains, or identifiers
- [ ] All examples use approved placeholders
- [ ] I reviewed AI-generated content for leaks or hallucinations
